info.title: iotDpsClient
info.description: API for using the Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service features.

get.description: Lists all of the available Microsoft.Devices REST API operations.
Get the certificate from the provisioning service.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: Name of the certificate to retrieve.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group identifier.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service the certificate is associated with.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the certificate. This is required to update an existing certificate, and ignored while creating a brand new certificate.

put.summary: Upload the certificate to the provisioning service.
put.description: Add new certificate or update an existing certificate.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group identifier.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: The name of the provisioning service.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: The name of the certificate create or update.

parameters.name: certificateDescription
parameters.description: The certificate body.

200.description: If certificate already exist and update was successful, the operation returns HTTP status code of 201 (OK).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group identifier.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: The name of the provisioning service.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: This is a mandatory field, and is the logical name of the certificate that the provisioning service will access by.

parameters.name: certificate.name
parameters.description: This is optional, and it is the Common Name of the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.rawBytes
parameters.description: Raw data within the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.isVerified
parameters.description: Indicates if certificate has been verified by owner of the private key.

parameters.name: certificate.purpose
parameters.description: A description that mentions the purpose of the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.created
parameters.description: Time the certificate is created.

parameters.name: certificate.lastUpdated
parameters.description: Time the certificate is last updated.

parameters.name: certificate.hasPrivateKey
parameters.description: Indicates if the certificate contains a private key.

parameters.name: certificate.nonce
parameters.description: Random number generated to indicate Proof of Possession.

get.summary: Get the non-security related metadata of the provisioning service.
get.description: Get the non-security related metadata of the provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group name.

200.description: Provisioning service description with no keys is included in the response.

put.summary: Create or update the metadata of the provisioning service.
put.description: Create or update the metadata of the provisioning service. The usual pattern to modify a property is to retrieve the provisioning service metadata and security metadata, and then combine them with the modified values in a new body to update the provisioning service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group identifier.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of provisioning service to create or update.

parameters.name: iotDpsDescription
parameters.description: Description of the provisioning service to create or update.

200.description: The body contains all the non-security properties of the provisioning service. Security-related properties are set to null.

201.description: This is a long running operation. The operation returns a 201 if the validation is complete. The response includes an Azure-AsyncOperation header that contains a status URL. Clients are expected to poll the status URL for the status of the operation. If successful, the operation returns HTTP status code of 201 (OK).

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of provisioning service to delete.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group identifier.

202.description: The provisioning service resource provider always returns a 202 Accepted status code with valid Location and Retry-After headers. The resource provider also sets the Azure-AsyncOperation header with a URL that points to the operation resource for this operation. Subsequent GET attempts on the resource after a DELETE operation return a resource representation that indicates a transitional provisioning state (such as Terminating). To retrieve the status of the operation, a client can either poll the URL returned in the Location header after the Retry-After interval, get the provisioning service status directly, or query the operation resource.

200.description: This is returned as a response to the status polling request for the delete operation. The body contains the resource representation that indicates a transitional provisioning state.

204.description: Once the long running delete operation completes successfully, a 204 No Content status code is returned when the status polling request finds the provisioning service metadata in the service and the status of the delete operation is set to a completed state.

404.description: After the long running delete operation completes successfully, a 404 Not Found is returned when the status polling request no longer finds the provisioning service metadata in the service.

get.description: Get all the certificates tied to the provisioning service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of resource group.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of provisioning service to retrieve certificates for.

200.description: List of certificate descriptions in a JSON-serialized array.

get.summary: Get all the provisioning services in a subscription.
get.description: Get all the provisioning services in a subscription.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the provisioning services in the subscription.

get.description: Get a list of all provisioning services in the given resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group identifier.

200.description: List of provisioning services in the resource group.

get.description: Gets the status of a long running operation, such as create, update or delete a provisioning service.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: Operation id corresponding to long running operation. Use this to poll for the status.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group identifier.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of provisioning service that the operation is running on.

parameters.name: asyncinfo
parameters.description: Async header used to poll on the status of the operation, obtained while creating the long running operation.

200.description: The status of the long running operation.

get.summary: Get the list of valid SKUs for a provisioning service.
get.description: Get the list of valid SKUs for a provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of provisioning service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of resource group.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the valid SKUs for this provisioning service.

post.description: Generate verification code for Proof of Possession.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: The mandatory logical name of the certificate, that the provisioning service uses to access.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: name of resource group.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of provisioning service.

parameters.name: certificate.name
parameters.description: Common Name for the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.rawBytes
parameters.description: Raw data of certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.isVerified
parameters.description: Indicates if the certificate has been verified by owner of the private key.

parameters.name: certificate.purpose
parameters.description: Description mentioning the purpose of the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.created
parameters.description: Certificate creation time.

parameters.name: certificate.lastUpdated
parameters.description: Certificate last updated time.

parameters.name: certificate.hasPrivateKey
parameters.description: Indicates if the certificate contains private key.

parameters.name: certificate.nonce
parameters.description: Random number generated to indicate Proof of Possession.

200.description: Generated verification code for that certificate is returned.

post.description: Verifies certificate for the provisioning service.

parameters.name: certificateName
parameters.description: The mandatory logical name of the certificate, that the provisioning service uses to access.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group name.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Provisioning service name.

parameters.name: certificate.name
parameters.description: Common Name for the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.rawBytes
parameters.description: Raw data of certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.isVerified
parameters.description: Indicates if the certificate has been verified by owner of the private key.

parameters.name: certificate.purpose
parameters.description: Describe the purpose of the certificate.

parameters.name: certificate.created
parameters.description: Certificate creation time.

parameters.name: certificate.lastUpdated
parameters.description: Certificate last updated time.

parameters.name: certificate.hasPrivateKey
parameters.description: Indicates if the certificate contains private key.

parameters.name: certificate.nonce
parameters.description: Random number generated to indicate Proof of Possession.

post.summary: Check if a provisioning service name is available.
post.description: Check if a provisioning service name is available.

parameters.name: arguments
parameters.description: Set the name parameter in the OperationInputs structure to the name of the provisioning service to check.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized response that specifies whether the provisioning service name is available. If the name is not available, the body contains the reason.

post.summary: Get the security metadata for a provisioning service.
post.description: Get the security metadata for a provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: The provisioning service name to get the shared access keys for.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: resource group name

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of shared access policies, including keys, that you can use to access the provisioning service endpoints.

post.summary: Get a shared access policy by name from a provisioning service.
post.description: Get a shared access policy by name from a provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service.

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: Logical key name to get key-values for.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the provisioning service.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized shared access policy, including keys, that you can use to access one or more provisioning service endpoints.

AsyncOperationResult.description: Result of a long running operation.

ErrorMesssage.description: Error response containing message and code.

CertificateListDescription.description: The JSON-serialized array of Certificate objects.

certificate.description: Base-64 representation of the X509 leaf certificate .cer file or just .pem file content.

CertificateProperties.description: The description of an X509 CA Certificate.

expiry.description: The certificate's expiration date and time.

isVerified.description: Determines whether certificate has been verified.

created.description: The certificate's creation date and time.

updated.description: The certificate's last update date and time.

IotDpsSkuInfo.description: List of possible provisoning service SKUs.

tier.description: Pricing tier of the provisioning service.

capacity.description: The number of services of the selected tier allowed in the subscription.

ProvisioningServiceDescription.description: The description of the provisioning service.

etag.description: The Etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal ETag convention.

state.description: Current state of the provisioning service.

provisioningState.description: The ARM provisioning state of the provisioning service.

iotHubs.description: List of IoT hubs assosciated with this provisioning service.

allocationPolicy.description: Allocation policy to be used by this provisioning service.

deviceProvisioningHostName.description: Device endpoint for this provisioning service.

idScope.description: Unique identifier of this provisioning service.

name.description: Host name of the IoT hub.

connectionString.description: Connection string og the IoT hub.

location.description: ARM region of the IoT hub.

SharedAccessSignatureAuthorizationRule[A.description: Description of the shared access key.

Resource.description: The common properties of an Azure resource.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list IoT Hub operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of IoT Hub operations supported by the Microsoft.Devices resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

IotDpsSkuDefinition.description: SKU definition in terms of tier and units.

OperationInputs.description: Input values for operation results call.

name.description: The name of the Provisioning Service to check.

VerificationCodeResponse.description: Description of the response of the verification code.

isVerified.description: Indicate if the certificate is verified by owner of private key.

VerificationCodeRequest.description: Certificate to generate verification code for.
